name: Long Live the Cube
description:
Gamedev.tv 2022 Jam entry https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

 DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING

This is a simple infinite runner, made in Unity. Keayboard only (gamepad supported but not reflected in the UI).

There are six possible player actions, but only two are at available at any one time. Avoid obstacles and falls with what you have... but dying is not the end, it is just the beginning of a new action combination =)

Except for fonts, everything was made by us.

  • Music: A_Squirrel
  • Programming, shaders: iani_ancilla
  • Fonts: Sans Serif Plus 7, Neon Planet Display, Absolute Neon Script
